timeline.bodyText: Do we need the test framework?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText:
AuthFile from azure-resourcemanager-test.
ResourceNamer from azure-core-test.(As per the potential changes may happen on SdkContext.)
We may remove this if we expect to use other credential and SdkContext.
replies.author: xseeseesee

replies.bodyText:
ResourceNamer is not exactly required. A random GUID will mostly do.
AuthFile seems needed unless we choose a different credential.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText: I was putting UUID for creating storage account while the service return errors by resource name restriction.
replies.author: xseeseesee

replies.bodyText: storage account name is globally unique, and cannot have "-" in it. These requirement is there whatever util you choose, and no util can help if the name generated conflict with any one exists... Nothing about ResourceNamer here.
replies.author: weidongxu-microsoft

timeline.bodyText: How does data-plane prepare their test env?
timeline.author: weidongxu-microsoft

replies.bodyText:
String connectionString = System.getenv("STORAGE_CONNECTION_STRING");
They use the connection string.
replies.author: xseeseesee
